name: SUPA SHOOTA
description:
Run And Shoot All You Can.
Master The 4 Gun Types To Clear Your Path.
Enjoy And Shoot All You Can In This Action Endless Adventure.

COOL STUFFS:
- 100% Free.
- 4 Gun Types.
- Automatic Gun Switching.
- Screen Shakes.
- 6 Enemies Types
- The Visuals Are Pretty Cool If I May Say.
- Original Sweet Beats.
- Did I Say Shakes?
- Endless Gameplay.

HOW TO PLAY:
Tap,Hold And Release In The Direction You Want To Shoot.

-Handgun: Tap To Shoot, But Watch Out And Save Your Ammo.
-Tommygun: Hold To Continuous Shooting, But The Accuracy Will Decrease The More You Hold.
-Shotgun: Hold To Charge And Release To Shoot.
-Sniper Rifle: Hold To Aim And Release To Shoot.

What Are You Waiting? Just Go And Play It.
